name: Legend of the Silver Fox
description:
A medieval visual novel about a girl who loves adventures, a boy who accompanies her, and a village that bears a dark secret. The game offers ten different endings and is a mix between slice of life, fantasy and otome game. The novel is rated 13+.

Elenor loved the stories her father used to tell her. Especially the one about the Silver Fox. However, this was not a story. She knew it was true; the mysterious animal existed! In order to prove that her father was right all along she searches the Silver Fox herself. Together with her best friend, Jack who lives at the dairy, she keeps exploring the forest. One day, however, she meets another mysterious boy in the woods …

~ 50,000 words
10 endings
English & German
CG Gallery & Music Room
official Soundtrack

Story, characters, music – Marcel Weyers
Sprites, backgrounds – Senkou
Logo – iiStarCandy
Additional graphics – Torsten Sohrmann
Programming help – Asceai
Opening Song – Aural Wave
Engine – Ren'Py
